thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Michael Chung
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Michael Chung

author: Michael Chung
title: Michael Chung
text:
Bought the Onkyo BT headphone from eGlobal website. The transaction was easy, and I was informed of the dispatched shipping promptly. The tracking information kept me informed all the way and the shipping timeframe was very short before the product reaches me.
Product is new and packed well. So very happy.
